keys.app.title: GuestCenter | POS
keys.app.errorMessage: Unable to get current user context
keys.app.error.general: We're experiencing an issue on our side. Please try again. If the problem persists please call OpenTable at 1-800-OPENTABLE.
keys.supportPos.error.title: Error
keys.supportPos.error.message: Unable to get list of Point of Sales
keys.posSelect.selectMessage: Great. To begin your free integration, select your POS provider.
keys.posSelect.alreadySigned: POS Integration Addendum agreement is complete.
keys.unsupportedPos.title: Please tell us a little more about your POS System
keys.unsupportedPos.message: Which POS System do you use?
keys.submittedLeadGen.message: We don't currently have POS integration with this provider. We'll let you know as soon as we do.
keys.nextSteps.aloha.haspKey.invalid: The numeric code must be 4–7 digits.
keys.nextsteps.pos.default.waiting.congratula: Great! Now it‚Äôs just a matter of time‚Ä¶
keys.nextsteps.pos.default.waiting.doshii: We sent your information to Omnivore, our third party integrations partner. They may need you to sign a terms of service agreement. While not expected, you may need to follow up with your POS provider to confirm.
keys.nextsteps.pos.default.waiting.omnivore: We sent your information to Omnivore, our third-party integrations partner. They will be in touch with you to schedule a time to integrate your POS system with GuestCenter. They may need you to sign a terms of service agreement.
keys.nextsteps.pos.default.waiting.omnivore.d: Please note: Omnivore may collect and sell certain data from your systems. OpenTable is not involved in any such interactions.
keys.nextsteps.pos.aloha.haspkey: Find your unique identifier, a 4‚Äì7 digit numeric code called the {haspkey} or {cmcid}.
keys.nextsteps.pos.aloha.hereshow: Here's how you can find it:
keys.nextsteps.pos.aloha.optionone.contenta: Navigate to the Aloha Manager application on the back of house (BOH) Aloha server
keys.nextsteps.pos.aloha.optionone.contentb: Select ‚ÄúAbout Aloha Manager‚Äù in the file menu, and find the product information
keys.nextsteps.pos.aloha.optionone.contentc: Locate your unique identifier code, located next to the ‚ÄúKey Number‚Äù label.
keys.nextsteps.pos.aloha.optiontwo.contenta: Look at the licensing sticker on the back of the BOH Aloha hardware.
keys.nextsteps.pos.aloha.optiontwo.enterlabel: Enter and submit your unique identifier code below.
keys.nextsteps.pos.aloha.waiting.content1: You'll receive a confirmation email from Omnivore, our third-party integrations partner, within 1-2 weeks depending on how your system is setup.
keys.nextsteps.pos.aloha.waiting.content2: They may need you to sign a terms of service agreement.
keys.nextsteps.pos.toast.steptwo: If necessary, log in using your Toast credentials.
keys.nextsteps.pos.toast.stepthree: Click the "Submit" button to add the integration.
keys.nextsteps.pos.toast.waiting.content1: You'll receive a confirmation from Toast.
keys.nextsteps.pos.toast.waiting.content2: You'll also receive a confirmation email from Omnivore, our third-party integrations partner, within 5-8 business days.
keys.nextsteps.pos.toast.waiting.content3: They may need you to sign a terms of service agreement.
keys.nextsteps.pos.upserve.waiting.content1: We sent your information to Upserve. We just need to tie a few loose ends in GuestCenter and we will have you up and running in a couple of days.
keys.nextsteps.pos.upserve.waiting.content2: While you wait, please review Upserve‚Äôs {gettingStartedGuideLink}
keys.nextSteps.pos.upserve.step2: Copy and paste the web link to your account into the field below.
keys.nextSteps.pos.upserve.compare.content: If the restuarant information is not correct and/or does not match you can resubmit a new web address.
keys.nextSteps.upserve.link.label: Web address
keys.nextSteps.upserve.message.400: We were not able to verify this link. Please try again.
keys.nextSteps.upserve.message.403: The provided link does not have both Upserve POS and {nextStepsUpserveMessage403Link} payment processing. Please visit Upserve to upgrade.
keys.nextSteps.upserve.message.404: This link is not valid. Please try a different link.
keys.nextSteps.upserve.message.409: The link you entered is already active within OpenTable. Please enter a different link.
keys.nextSteps.upserve.message.412: Your Upserve user role permissions are not optimized for this integration. Please change all {nextStepsUpserveMessage412Link} before proceeding.
keys.nextSteps.upserve.message.503: We were not able to verify this link. Please try again.
keys.landing.header: You‚Äôre missing out. Set up your POS integration now.
keys.landing.message: Get deep insights, automate table status updates, and identify your best guests‚Äîat no extra cost.
keys.landing.tile1.message: Use reporting tools to filter, sort, search, and export reservation data with total guest spend.
keys.landing.tile2.message: Decrease turn times and improve your guest experience with POS-triggered table status updates.
keys.landing.tile3.message: Measure guest spend by reservation, phone, and walk-in business; and track the average per-cover and per-party spend.
keys.landing.quote.text: ‚ÄúGuestCenter‚Äôs automatic course status updates save our hosts time, enabling them to focus on greeting guests at the door. These automated updates better unify our team and eliminate extra steps for service and host staff, helping streamline our operations.‚Äù
keys.landing.quote.attribution: - Curtis Stevenson, GM, Paco‚Äôs Tacos and Tequila in Charlotte, NC
keys.posstatus.changepos.confirmation.title: Change the wrong POS system?
keys.posstatus.changepos.confirmation.body: No problem. You can go back to the beginning to choose a new POS system.
keys.posstatus.changepos.error: The integration with {yourpos} is complete. To change your POS, email us at {supportLink}
keys.posstatus.changepos.message: If you‚Äôd like to change or cancel your POS, email us at {supportLink}.
keys.posstatus.mobile.title: Have your numbers at your fingertips
keys.posstatus.mobile.text: Use the free GuestCenter mobile app to track current and average guest spend details.
keys.posstatus.card.bookings.description: Use reporting tools to filter, sort, search, and export reservation data with total guest spend.
keys.posstatus.card.bookings.title: Track your bookings to revenue
keys.posstatus.card.status.description: Decrease turn times and improve your guest experience with POS-triggered table status updates.
keys.posstatus.card.status.title: Speed up your operations
keys.posstatus.card.guests.description: Measure guest spend by reservation, phone, and walk in business; and track the average per-cover and per-party spend.
keys.posstatus.card.guests.title: Know your guests
keys.tablestatus.captionBody: To allow your POS to automatically update GuestCenter table statuses, assign your POS menu categories to their appropriate status.
keys.tablestatus.captionNotice: Note: categories assigned as Other do not update GuestCenter table statuses.
keys.tablestatus.emptyCategories.unassigned: No more categories are left to assign
keys.tablestatus.emptyCategories.appetizer: No categories have been assigned as an Appetizer
keys.tablestatus.emptyCategories.entree: No categories have been assigned as an Entree
keys.tablestatus.emptyCategories.dessert: No categories have been assigned as a Dessert
keys.tablestatus.emptyCategories.other: No categories have been assigned as Other
keys.tablestatus.savedStatusSuccess: Your table status have been saved
